description.raw:
* This pull request goes along with the drcsim pull request I'm about to create that updates all the model manifest.xml files.
* The updated manifest.xml files are all documented here: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Model_database
  * Please review the wiki documentation. I want this to be the last time the model database is updated before the kickoff.

* The setup.sh has changed to point to http://gazebosim.org/models. This is a better URI, and leaves the old database in place for current users.

* ModelDatabase: Improved error handling, and now parses the new manifest.xml files.
* SystemPaths: Now uses boost::filesystem for path generation and file testing.

  • ModelDatabase: Improved error handling, and now parses the new manifest.xml files.

  • SystemPaths: Now uses boost::filesystem for path generation and file testing.
